Text: Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Ononojo ki dʼo̩la-wñ manyu Jihofa ki we eka kakini,
Todu o̩la amonoji ku ma de o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi,
Omi akʼe̩wñ urewa kpai odu ñw ma ef unyi-mi kpʼef aku-mi
I che-abononojo ku ma kʼo̩la-ma manyu Jihofa,
Ondu Jihofa ki aya abo Israe̩l
Ame̩ ame̩wñ iñmi oko chaka, me̩ lewa mu ko je̩—
Ma kakini, Me̩ lewa-oo, kʼa kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma wa jo̩,
